item.title: Chapter title: The alchemy of enlightenment
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌Chapter title: The alchemy of enlightenment‌ 29 October 1986 pm in Archive code: 8610295 ShortTitle: ENLIGH26 Audio: Yes Video: Yes Length: 108 mins Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, SINCE MY CHILDHOOD, I HAVE SEEN YOU AS A BUDDHA, EVEN BEFORE YOUR ENLIGHTENMENT I SAW YOU AS A BUDDHA -- THE SAME SERENITY, THE SAME NATURAL GLOW, THE SAME SPONTANEITY, THE SAME LOVE, THE SAME COMPASSION, THE SAME CAREFREENESS, THE SAME

item.title: Chapter title: The only holy approach
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: The only holy approach‌ 15 October 1986 pm in Archive code: 8610155 ShortTitle: ENLIGH13 Audio: Yes Video: Yes Length: 132 mins Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, WHEN I CLOSE MY EYES, I FEEL SUCH AN ENORMOUS PRESENCE, SUCH A VAST ISNESS, SUCH A BEATITUDE. BUT IT IS A FULLNESS, NOT AN EMPTINESS. COULD YOU PLEASE SAY SOMETHING ABOUT THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THIS FULLNESS, AND THE EMPTINESS OR NOTHINGNESS WHICH YOU ARE

item.title: Chapter title: Truth knows no fifty-fifty
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Truth knows no fifty-fifty‌ 8 October 1986 pm in Archive code: 8610085 ShortTitle: ENLIGH06 Audio: Yes Video: Yes Length: 118 mins Question 1 BELOVED OSHO, I AM REQUESTING YOUR GUIDANCE ON MY ANSWER TO SOMETHING I HEARD YOU SAY TO ME -- WHICH YOU NEVER ACTUALLY SAID. DURING MY SANNYAS DARSHAN YOU SPOKE TO ME AT LENGTH ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED TO BUDDHA'S TEACHINGS AFTER BUDDHA LEFT HIS
